caption:
Video Games

Week Ending September 4th, 2018

  1. Overwatch
  2. Detroit: Become Human
  3. Harry Potter: Hogwarts Mystery +4
  4. The Arcana - A Story of Mystery and Romance +1
  5. Choices −1
  6. Cyberpunk 2077
  7. Splatoon −4
  8. World of Warcraft −2
  9. Undertale
  10. Persona 5
  11. The Sims 4 +3
  12. Hiveswap
  13. Spyro Reignited Trilogy −1
  14. Fire Emblem Heroes −6
  15. Kingdom Hearts III
  16. Cookie Run
  17. League of Legends +1
  18. Mystic Messenger +1
  19. Dead by Daylight
  20. Super Smash Bros. Ultimate −3

The number in italics indicates how many spots a title moved up or down from the previous week. Bolded titles weren’t on the list last week.

blog.name: funtime-error
blog.title: Funtime Error
blog.description: Gaming news, in context. Follow for something interesting every day. I know the Tumblr app messes up my blockquotes. Written by Kyle Nazario.

title: 🎮 Cyberpunk 2077 and next gen consoles
body:
I finally got around to watching the 48-and-a-half-minute gameplay demo for Cyberpunk 2077. Like everyone else, I am fascinated to see this given CD Projekt Red’s last game was one of the best RPGs ever made.

The world looks incredible. Many of the reactions I saw on Reddit, Podquisition and The Game Informer Show praised the environments.

That last reaction is the one that sparked this post, though. Game Informer’s editors were adamant that what we saw in the gameplay trailer is a next-gen experience. They think Cyberpunk 2077 will be on current gen (PS4/Xbox One/weaker PCs), but it won’t be what was shown in that video. [1]

I think this is right. Despite CD Projekt’s claims they are aiming for current-gen consoles, they’d be crazy not to plan for next gen. With new consoles tentatively pegged for 2020, Cyberpunk would be one of the last major releases on current gen consoles.

Look back at 2013. The PS4 and Xbox One launched, the latter a spectacular disaster I want to recount in a future post. Major games like Grand Theft Auto V and The Last of Us hit Xbox 360 and PS3, then pivoted to better versions for next gen.

This is probably what will happen with Cyberpunk 2077. There will be a version on the PS4 and Xbox One, but the stunning vision they showed in that gameplay trailer is probably impossible without a high-end PC or next gen console. [2]

As far as I can tell, CD Projekt Red has not revealed what platform their gameplay demo is on. They are such a PC-centric studio that it probably is a high-end PC, and they are probably serious when they claim that’s what they’re targeting.

I’m just saying, they’d be crazy to make a high-end version and not port it to next gen consoles and you’ll probably need one to get that experience.

🎮 funtime-error

  1. As a counterpoint, DualShockers has a good post arguing what they showed could be done on current gen. ↩

  2. At E3s leading up to the PS4 and Xbox One reveals there were a lot of third-party developers making suspiciously good-looking games for “high-end PCs.” Keep an eye out for this euphemism. ↩

trail.content_raw:
I finally got around to watching the 48-and-a-half-minute gameplay demo for Cyberpunk 2077. Like everyone else, I am fascinated to see this given CD Projekt Red’s last game was one of the best RPGs ever made.

The world looks incredible. Many of the reactions I saw on Reddit, Podquisition and The Game Informer Show praised the environments.

That last reaction is the one that sparked this post, though. Game Informer’s editors were adamant that what we saw in the gameplay trailer is a next-gen experience. They think Cyberpunk 2077 will be on current gen (PS4/Xbox One/weaker PCs), but it won’t be what was shown in that video. [1]

I think this is right. Despite CD Projekt’s claims they are aiming for current-gen consoles, they’d be crazy not to plan for next gen. With new consoles tentatively pegged for 2020, Cyberpunk would be one of the last major releases on current gen consoles.

Look back at 2013. The PS4 and Xbox One launched, the latter a spectacular disaster I want to recount in a future post. Major games like Grand Theft Auto V and The Last of Us hit Xbox 360 and PS3, then pivoted to better versions for next gen.

This is probably what will happen with Cyberpunk 2077. There will be a version on the PS4 and Xbox One, but the stunning vision they showed in that gameplay trailer is probably impossible without a high-end PC or next gen console. [2]

As far as I can tell, CD Projekt Red has not revealed what platform their gameplay demo is on. They are such a PC-centric studio that it probably is a high-end PC, and they are probably serious when they claim that’s what they’re targeting.

I’m just saying, they’d be crazy to make a high-end version and not port it to next gen consoles and you’ll probably need one to get that experience.

🎮 funtime-error

  1. As a counterpoint, DualShockers has a good post arguing what they showed could be done on current gen. ↩

  2. At E3s leading up to the PS4 and Xbox One reveals there were a lot of third-party developers making suspiciously good-looking games for “high-end PCs.” Keep an eye out for this euphemism. ↩
trail.content:
I finally got around to watching the 48-and-a-half-minute gameplay demo for Cyberpunk 2077. Like everyone else, I am fascinated to see this given CD Projekt Red’s last game was one of the best RPGs ever made.

The world looks incredible. Many of the reactions I saw on Reddit, Podquisition and The Game Informer Show praised the environments.

That last reaction is the one that sparked this post, though. Game Informer’s editors were adamant that what we saw in the gameplay trailer is a next-gen experience. They think Cyberpunk 2077 will be on current gen (PS4/Xbox One/weaker PCs), but it won’t be what was shown in that video. [1]

I think this is right. Despite CD Projekt’s claims they are aiming for current-gen consoles, they’d be crazy not to plan for next gen. With new consoles tentatively pegged for 2020, Cyberpunk would be one of the last major releases on current gen consoles.

Look back at 2013. The PS4 and Xbox One launched, the latter a spectacular disaster I want to recount in a future post. Major games like Grand Theft Auto V and The Last of Us hit Xbox 360 and PS3, then pivoted to better versions for next gen.

This is probably what will happen with Cyberpunk 2077. There will be a version on the PS4 and Xbox One, but the stunning vision they showed in that gameplay trailer is probably impossible without a high-end PC or next gen console. [2]

As far as I can tell, CD Projekt Red has not revealed what platform their gameplay demo is on. They are such a PC-centric studio that it probably is a high-end PC, and they are probably serious when they claim that’s what they’re targeting.

I’m just saying, they’d be crazy to make a high-end version and not port it to next gen consoles and you’ll probably need one to get that experience.

🎮 funtime-error

  1. As a counterpoint, DualShockers has a good post arguing what they showed could be done on current gen. ↩

  2. At E3s leading up to the PS4 and Xbox One reveals there were a lot of third-party developers making suspiciously good-looking games for “high-end PCs.” Keep an eye out for this euphemism. ↩

summary: Cyberpunk Aesthetic - Nomad Former corporate wage-slaves who were cast out from society one way or another, they now roam the...
caption:
Cyberpunk Aesthetic - Nomad

Former corporate wage-slaves who were cast out from society one way or another, they now roam the highways as motor-gangs and caravaners.

summary: Cyberpunk 2077 no tendrá un "sistema de compañeros", pero sí dejará adquirir propiedades
title: Cyberpunk 2077 no tendrá un "sistema de compañeros", pero sí dejará adquirir propiedades
body:
Cyberpunk 2077 no tendrá un “sistema de compañeros”, pero sí dejará adquirir propiedades

Uno de los juegos mas esperados de CD Projekt Red vuelve a acaparar todas las miradas, hablamos del aclamadisimo Cyberpunk 2077, el juego que presenta un futuro distopico de humanos con implantes, droides, robots, y crimen, aderezados con caos.

El estudio polaco responsable de la trilogía de videojuegos The Witcher vuelve al ruedo con Cyberpunk 2077, un proyecto que acumula varios años de…

View On WordPress
